pageContext.public_note: Camp partnered with Hawaii PhotoVentures. Early drop off at 8:15am, program starts at 8:30am. Camp open to the public. All campers are required to bring a peanut-free lunch, snack and drink.  Photography and new LEGO projects will be featured.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Mr. Wrenn Okada and Play-Well presents a brand new program, Hawaii PhotoVentures, that will introduce students into the awe-inspiring world of photography! Students will see the world in a fresh and unique perspective using the state-of-the-art Fujiflim Intax Mini Liplay Instant Cameras and Professional Sony Mirrorless Cameras, while developing skills in the arts of portrait, landscape, selfie, product and macro photography. Principles in composition, lighting, rule of thirds, indoor vs outdoor photography and much more will be explored while students shoot, edit in-camera, print and showcase their work in a take-home portfolio. Students will have access to Intax Mini Liplay Cameras, Intax film, professional Sony Mirrorless Cameras, lighting, props, tripods, backdrops and more. Then master your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Mechanized Walkers, Elastic Catapults, Motorized Conveyor Belts, Giant Castles, and everyones favorite, Battletracks! Design and build as never before, explore your craziest ideas in a supportive environment and then take photos of your project.  All skill levels welcome, all materials provided and new photo and LEGO projects will be featured every semester.  For more information please visit www.play-well.org and www.wrennokada.com
pageContext.course_type_name: Hawaii PhotoVentures & Play-Well STEM w/ LEGO Camp
